Name: Small chest in the shape of a shrine
Description: The front of this small chest is brightly painted. Polychrome bands decorate a pylon-shaped door. Above this sit two falcon-headed lions with sun discs on their heads. Their tails rise vertically into the air and end in lotus umbels. With a raised paw, each is holding a lotus stem (or a papyrus stem ?), tied together at the top. Between the two solar discs is the sign for "horizon". The scene is topped by a kheker-frieze. The other three sides have been painted black-green with a yellow border. On the right side is a painted inscription in Demotic.
